:::HealdAngle was deep with in his un-presidented trance, the things he saw 
were disterbing, a battle was raging contless bodies laid on the field, the 
field was slowly terning into a lake of mec fluid. he saw Defection in the 
midle of it all atempteng to stop the raging war, he saw datastreaks bodie. 
he looked at the sky and saw countless angles batteling each other. as the 
battle began to wain he counted the bodies, he coculated that 9 tenths of the 
curent wariers lay dead  the rest of them wonded, it was the iliad of the 
robots, but now both troy and geece lay slain. the angles in all there glory 
were now dead and broken on the stained earth. He saw himself, one of the few 
living, holding 3 bodies near hin, they were Defection, DataStreak and Onyx, 
the 3 bots that had fought for peace so hard now lay dead. then he looked at 
the field, you couldent see it the boddies were to thick:::

He thought to him self 'Why must this happen, if some one dosent do somthing 
thatn this will happen! I cant let it... MATRIX HELP ME!' and then he got a
